content.title: Grammar
table: If Sara goes I will also go.
I will do it if I can.
If they go you will also go.

content.title: Conversation
table: ب: من در رشت زندگی می‌کنم.
A: Is it in southern Iran?
الف: آیا آن در جنوب ایران است؟
B: No. It's in northern Iran.
ب: نه آن در شمال ایران است.
A: Is Rasht a big city?
الف: رشت یک شهر بزرگ است؟
B: Yes, it's a big city.
ب: بله، آن یک شهر بزرگ است.
ب: جمعیت آن حدود ۶۳۹۹۵۱ نفر است.

content.title: Grammar
table: I would help if I could.
If you had time, I would have helped.

content.title: Conversation
table: Susan: Where in Iran are you from?
Susan: What kind of city is your hometown?
سوسن: شهر تو چگونه شهری است؟
نادیا: پرجمعیت و پر سروصدا است.

content.title: Reading
content.description:
Saadi is one of Irans famous poets. He in lived in Shiraz in the thirteenth century. Saadi has three popular books by the names Gulistan, Bustan and the Divan.
Saadis poem "Bani Adam" is very famous and has been translated into many different languages. The twenteenth of April is Saadis commemoration day in Iran.
